Name: The Revival
About the game: Key Features: Single Player Campaign and Cinematics Campaign and storyline where you will play as an elite special soldier taking you to different dangerous places and conflicts around the world with the special weapons and equipment which is provided to you Prologue Storlyline In the near future, an armed bio-corporation that uses humans in their deadly experiments, finds a virus. This virus begins to spread rapidly around the world. It kills the infected person within a few months. There is a temporary injection that resets every 2 months. This dangerous organization kidnaps your wife and daughter and conducts deadly experiments on them. As a soldier you left the army to save your family. You have to fight against specially trained military groups. This risky and dangerous mission turns into a death sentence as you try to infiltrate your competitors' bases to save your family on your own.
